circumstances: David Davidson, a retired scientist, was last seen at the train station, sparking concern among family and friends due to his routine travel patterns. Having recently come out publicly about his LGBTQ+ identity, he had faced increased stress, especially from unexpected reactions. On the day of his disappearance, Michelle Rogers, a close friend, mentioned he seemed distracted at 1 Pitfour Street, Dundee, after picking up some travel brochures. Later, a colleague noticed David missing from their usual meeting spot, 296A Strathmore Avenue, Dundee. Ultimately, he was traced by staff at a waterfront residential area, unharmed but needing support, highlighting his disorientation and emotional distress related to the recent events in his life.
